---
category: news
title: "To Build Less-Biased AI, Hire a More-Diverse Team"
excerpt: "To combat bias in AI, companies need more diverse AI talent. After all, if none of the researchers building facial recognition systems are people of color, ensuring that non-white faces are properly distinguished may be a far lower priority."
